attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it seems every time school holidays come around, be it summer or winter every holiday in this country or abroad goes up in price astronomically. what is this phenomena. it seems we are penalised for having children. come on stop this exploitation, you know it is wrong yet you still allow this to take place. another thing my wife works in a school, so the only time we can take holidays is, yes! in the school holidays.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
